gov.nih.nlm.ling.graph

Interface Node

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContiguousSurfaceElement, SurfaceElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSurfaceElement, DummyNode, GappedMultiWord, MultiWord, Word

    public interface Node
    An interface that represents a vertex in a graph. It can be used to represent textual units as well as units larger than individual textual units that need to be processed as a single unit in discourse processing, such as quotations, sentences, etc.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
    See Also:
    SurfaceElement, DummyNode
